data.convo: Grand Theft Auto Three is awesome ! It's more violent than TV news ! What time is it anyway ? Nine-thirty . Oh , my God , three hours already ! I have to get the chores done ! No time . That's their headlights in the window ! OK , emergency measures . Let's throw the dishes in the trash ! Two birds with one stone ... Little dude , your life is over ! No time to worry . We have to dispose of this evidence .
